1047:2: ye hi jinā viditānutpādatve'pi vyavahāramukhapūrṇakaruṇayā saṃsṛtisahasre sukhena lokarakṣaṇāyeha pratipannā api nirmalamatayastānahaṃ sadā praṇamāmi ||
1047:6: paramārtho niṣprapañcaḥ kartavyo dvividhaḥ sa ca || 2||
1047:8: sa ca syātprathamo dvedhā jātiparyāyavastu ca || 3 ||
1047:14: etādṛk paramārtho hi yathābhāse tu saṃvṛtiḥ || 6 ||
1047:15: dvividhā sāpi vijñeyā mithyābhūtā ca saṃvṛtiḥ |
1047:18: mithyābhūtā saṃvṛtiḥ syādvijñeyā dvividhā ca sā ||8 ||
1047:21: tena satyaṃ dvidhā sarva sāmastyena tu dṛśyate |
1047:22: upādāya tadarthaṃ hi sarvā prāpnoti sampadam ||10 ||
1047:24: kalyāṇo yaḥ sa sattvasya sādhayatvāśu cintitam || 11 ||
